I visited Attelia Oral and Dental Health Center for a teeth cleaning and polishing, and I couldnâ€™t be happier with the experience. The clinic is absolutely state-of-the-art - modern, immaculate, and clearly focused on providing high-end dental care.

I originally booked for laser teeth whitening, but after a detailed consultation, the dentist explained that my teeth were already very white and whitening would make little difference. Instead, they recommended a professional cleaning and polishing, which left my teeth looking incredibly smooth, bright, and natural. I really appreciated the honesty and the fact that they prioritised what was genuinely best for me rather than pushing unnecessary treatments.

During my visit, I also discussed a potential implant for a baby tooth that hasnâ€™t been replaced yet, and within no time I received a full, clear treatment plan with all the details I needed. Everything was handled efficiently and professionally from start to finish.
